009package Point_Operations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014
015public class Equalize_Histogram implements PlugInFilter {
016
017        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus img) {
018                return DOES_8G;
019        }
020    
021        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
022                int M = ip.getWidth();
023                int N = ip.getHeight();
024                int K = 256; // number of intensity values
025
026                // compute the cumulative histogram:
027                int[] H = ip.getHistogram();
028                for (int j = 1; j < H.length; j++) {
029                        H[j] = H[j - 1] + H[j];
030                }
031
032                // equalize the image:
033                for (int v = 0; v < N; v++) {
034                        for (int u = 0; u < M; u++) {
035                                int a = ip.get(u, v);
036                                int b = H[a] * (K - 1) / (M * N);
037                                ip.set(u, v, b);
038                        }
039                }
040        }
041        
042}
